text: Alpersite is a magnesium copper sulfate mineral with the chemical formula (Mg,Cu)[SO]·7HO. It is named for United States Geological Survey geochemist Charles N. Alpers.Alpersite on mindat.org Alpersite crystals (white) with slavíkite ==References== Category:Magnesium minerals Category:Copper(II) minerals Category:Sulfate minerals
title: Alpersite
